basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli D21 (MLC=0.32 µM), Escherichia coli D31 (MLC=0.32 µM), Serratia marcescens Db11 (MLC=4.5 µM), Serratia marcescens Db1108 (MLC=2.4 µM), Serratia marcescens Db1121 (MLC=2.2 µM), Serratia marcescens Strain 122 (MLC=2.9 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa OT97 (MLC=1.9 µM), Xenorhabdus nematophilus Xn21 (MLC=1.6 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus megaterium Bmll (MLC=0.44 µM), Bacillus subtilis Bs11 (MLC=18 µM), B.thuringiensis Bt11 (MLC>133 µM), Streptococcus fecalis AD-4 (MLC=7.3 µM), Streptococcus fecalis DS16 (MLC>24 µM), Micrococcus luteus M111 (MLC=1.3 µM).
